name: Cyber Sheep demo
description:
Cyber Sheep is a game about three characters traveling in and out of a transforming labyrinth to figure out who or what this threat is. It is an action/platform similar to Megaman Zero and the ZX series. With different modules that upgrade the character in different, and sometimes unique ways, explore different areas.

Currently, the game is in an early state. All three characters are playable, but the first area has no end and is set on a loop. The shops, controls, and adventure itself all work, however. I am mostly uploading this for feedback and bugs that may happen.

Current Features
  • Fast pace, action heavy gameplay similar to Megaman Zero.
  • Three playable characters; Ophelia, Cythia and Shadow.
  • Weapon fusion system where certain weapons can be combined.
  • A roguelite with heavy emphasis on story. (Currently no abrupt level ending with no boss)
Controls
  • A - Jump/Confirm
  • S - Attack/Cancel
  • D - Item
  • E/R - Change menus/Selected weapon
  • Q - Dash/Special
  • M - map
  • Controls can be changed in the pause menu.(As I know my controls aren't optimized for all)

I want to continue updating the game as well as a couple others I work on to not get burned out on one thing. So if you'd like, follow me at @TheYawningFox to hear about my progress!

All kinds of feedback and reports are appreciated.
